name: polymath
description: Polymath is an engaging and challenging quiz game designed to test your knowledge across a wide range of subjects. From science to history, literature to geography, Polymath covers it all. With varying levels of difficulty and a multitude of categories to choose from, Polymath offers a unique learning experience for trivia enthusiasts of all ages. Whether youâ€™re a casual trivia player or a seasoned quiz master, Polymath is the perfect platform to test your knowledge, learn new facts, and become a seasoned  polymath!
author: Trevor Machete
